targets.rawSql: SELECT height FROM blocks ORDER BY height DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
    AVG(time_diff) AS avg_time_between_blocks
FROM (
    SELECT 
        EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (b2.time - b1.time)) AS time_diff
    FROM 
        blocks b1
    JOIN 
        blocks b2 ON b2.height = b1.height + 1
    WHERE $__timeFilter(b1.time) AND $__timeFilter(b2.time)
) AS time_diffs;

SELECT 
    EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - MAX(time))) AS time_since_latest_block_seconds
FROM 
    blocks;
SELECT MAX(total_txs) FROM blocks;

WITH validators_latest_signed_blocks AS (
  SELECT
    validator_addr,
    MAX(bs.block_height) AS latest_block_signed
  FROM
    block_signatures AS bs
  WHERE 
    bs.signed = TRUE
  GROUP BY 
    bs.validator_addr
  ORDER BY 
    latest_block_signed ASC
)
SELECT
    v.validator_name,
    bs.validator_addr,
    bs.latest_block_signed
FROM validators_latest_signed_blocks AS bs
JOIN validators AS v ON bs.validator_addr = v.validator_addr
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM validators;

WITH block_times AS (
    SELECT 
        time,
        LAG(time) OVER (ORDER BY height) AS previous_time
    FROM 
        blocks
    WHERE 
        $__timeFilter(time)
),
time_diffs AS (
    SELECT 
        EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (time - previous_time)) AS diff_seconds
    FROM 
        block_times
    WHERE 
        previous_time IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT 
    PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY diff_seconds) AS median_block_time
FROM 
    time_diffs;

SELECT 
    EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - MIN(time))) AS time_since_latest_block_seconds
FROM 
    blocks;
SELECT SUM(num_txs) FROM blocks WHERE $__timeFilter(time);

SELECT
    v.validator_name,
    COUNT(bs.block_height) AS non_signed_blocks
FROM
    validators v
LEFT JOIN
    block_signatures bs ON v.validator_addr = bs.validator_addr
WHERE
    bs.signed = FALSE
GROUP BY
    v.validator_name
ORDER BY
    non_signed_blocks DESC;

WITH missed_blocks_per_minute AS (
    SELECT
        date_trunc('minute', b.time) AS "time",
        v.validator_name,
        COUNT(*) AS missed_blocks
    FROM
        blocks b
    LEFT JOIN
        block_signatures bs ON b.height = bs.block_height
    LEFT JOIN
        validators v ON bs.validator_addr = v.validator_addr
    WHERE
        bs.signed = FALSE
        AND $__timeFilter(b.time)
    GROUP BY
        date_trunc('minute', b.time), v.validator_name
),
cumulative_missed_blocks AS (
    SELECT
        "time",
        validator_name,
        SUM(missed_blocks) OVER (PARTITION BY validator_name ORDER BY "time" ASC) AS cumulative_missed_blocks
    FROM
        missed_blocks_per_minute
)
SELECT
    "time",
    validator_name,
    cumulative_missed_blocks AS " "
FROM
    cumulative_missed_blocks
ORDER BY
    "time" ASC, validator_name ASC;

SELECT
    NOW()           AS time,
    validator_name  AS data,
    COUNT(*)        AS " "  
FROM
    blocks
JOIN validators ON blocks.proposer_address = validators.validator_addr
WHERE $__timeFilter(time) 
GROUP BY
    1, 2
ORDER BY 2

SELECT
    validator_name,
    proposer_address,
    COUNT(*) AS nb_block_proposed
FROM
    blocks
JOIN validators ON blocks.proposer_address = validators.validator_addr
WHERE $__timeFilter(time) 
GROUP BY
    validator_name, proposer_address
ORDER BY
    nb_block_proposed DESC;

WITH block_diffs AS (
    SELECT
        height,
        time,
        COALESCE(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (time - LAG(time) OVER (ORDER BY height))), 0) AS time_diff_seconds
    FROM
        blocks
)
SELECT
    height,
    time,
    time_diff_seconds
FROM
    block_diffs
WHERE
    time_diff_seconds > 25
ORDER BY
    height DESC;

SELECT 
  time, total_txs
FROM blocks
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  SUM(num_txs)
FROM blocks
WHERE $__timeFilter(time) 
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  NOW()        AS time,
  route         AS data,
  count(route)  AS " "
FROM messages  AS msg
JOIN blocks    AS b ON b.height = msg.height
WHERE $__timeFilter(b.time) 
GROUP BY data
ORDER BY 3 DESC;

SELECT
  NOW()        AS time,
  type         AS data,
  count(type)  AS " "
FROM messages  AS msg
JOIN blocks    AS b ON b.height = msg.height
WHERE $__timeFilter(b.time)
GROUP BY data
ORDER BY 3 DESC;

WITH pkg_paths AS (
  SELECT  msg_raw->>'pkg_path' AS pkg_path FROM messages WHERE msg_raw->>'pkg_path' IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
  NOW()           AS time,
  pkg_path        AS data,
  COUNT(pkg_path) AS " "
  FROM pkg_paths
  GROUP BY 1, 2
  ORDER BY 3 DESC;

-- SELECT
--   NOW()        AS time,
--   route         AS data,
--   count(route)  AS value
-- FROM messages  AS msg
-- JOIN blocks    AS b ON b.height = msg.height
-- WHERE $__timeFilter(b.time) 
-- GROUP BY data
-- ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT route, COUNT(route) AS "count" FROM  messages GROUP BY route;
SELECT type, COUNT(type) AS "count" FROM  messages GROUP BY type;

SELECT b.time, msg.height, msg.route, msg.type, msg.msg_raw
FROM messages AS msg
JOIN blocks   AS b ON b.height = msg.height
WHERE $__timeFilter(b.time) 
ORDER BY height DESC;

SELECT 
  COUNT(*)
FROM messages 
WHERE route = 'bank'
  AND type  = 'send'
  AND msg_raw->>'from_address' IN (
    'g1njagaeg7e398hze39ygfgvc4gwsh6lkz7dwnuz',
    'g1a5kdc6ykfykq9p6088sclnr7e63hj8y4nnr5gn',
    'g1gadp0yq5djelxwv7h8g7wpdf7x5w3vuzwmqrne',
    'g1s6ujq0r200a0tfqgnjfflz7ddetsnrwvzxxx74',
    'g1d7set9rsdw7ggt9elvzerep4jz80a4hu4crmzg',
    'g1cm7u2fqd7drwfcqtn7zsgrfcyvlkkukhhtrxxj',
    'g13csus64lj8twrn266837l9e77dusk2zwa794qz',
    'g1knpjkw7d5ft2830n8rnatllzq9gu85dmn20nrp',
    'g1563d3cw0gdv68le6azw2s63xm0jx9xvgpmfatq',
    'g1xja7p9s3ly3tvkgks9x0n6f6yau2hnzl4x8x3d'
  );

WITH faucet_gno_sent AS (

SELECT 
  (jsonb_array_elements((msg_raw->>'amount')::JSONB) ->> 'amount')::NUMERIC / 1000000 AS sent
FROM messages 
WHERE route = 'bank'
  AND type  = 'send'
  AND msg_raw->>'from_address' IN (
    'g1njagaeg7e398hze39ygfgvc4gwsh6lkz7dwnuz',
    'g1a5kdc6ykfykq9p6088sclnr7e63hj8y4nnr5gn',
    'g1gadp0yq5djelxwv7h8g7wpdf7x5w3vuzwmqrne',
    'g1s6ujq0r200a0tfqgnjfflz7ddetsnrwvzxxx74',
    'g1d7set9rsdw7ggt9elvzerep4jz80a4hu4crmzg',
    'g1cm7u2fqd7drwfcqtn7zsgrfcyvlkkukhhtrxxj',
    'g13csus64lj8twrn266837l9e77dusk2zwa794qz',
    'g1knpjkw7d5ft2830n8rnatllzq9gu85dmn20nrp',
    'g1563d3cw0gdv68le6azw2s63xm0jx9xvgpmfatq',
    'g1xja7p9s3ly3tvkgks9x0n6f6yau2hnzl4x8x3d'
  )
)
SELECT SUM(sent) FROM faucet_gno_sent;

WITH faucet_gno_sent AS (

SELECT 
  (jsonb_array_elements((msg_raw->>'amount')::JSONB) ->> 'amount')::NUMERIC / 1000000 AS sent
FROM messages 
WHERE route = 'bank'
  AND type  = 'send'
  AND msg_raw->>'from_address' IN (
    'g1njagaeg7e398hze39ygfgvc4gwsh6lkz7dwnuz',
    'g1a5kdc6ykfykq9p6088sclnr7e63hj8y4nnr5gn',
    'g1gadp0yq5djelxwv7h8g7wpdf7x5w3vuzwmqrne',
    'g1s6ujq0r200a0tfqgnjfflz7ddetsnrwvzxxx74',
    'g1d7set9rsdw7ggt9elvzerep4jz80a4hu4crmzg',
    'g1cm7u2fqd7drwfcqtn7zsgrfcyvlkkukhhtrxxj',
    'g13csus64lj8twrn266837l9e77dusk2zwa794qz',
    'g1knpjkw7d5ft2830n8rnatllzq9gu85dmn20nrp',
    'g1563d3cw0gdv68le6azw2s63xm0jx9xvgpmfatq',
    'g1xja7p9s3ly3tvkgks9x0n6f6yau2hnzl4x8x3d'
  )
)
SELECT
  sent,
  SUM(sent)
FROM faucet_gno_sent
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2;

WITH count_missing_blocks AS ( SELECT gs.height
FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT MAX(height) FROM blocks)) AS gs(height)
LEFT JOIN blocks b ON gs.height = b.height
WHERE b.height IS NULL
ORDER BY gs.height
)
Select count(*) from count_missing_blocks;

SELECT gs.height
FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT MAX(height) FROM blocks)) AS gs(height)
LEFT JOIN blocks b ON gs.height = b.height
WHERE b.height IS NULL
ORDER BY gs.height;
